scripts.precommit: npm run prettier:apply && npm run lint && npm run prettier:check && npm test
scripts.update:all: npm run update:cli && npm run update:packages && npm run update:types
scripts.update:packages: npm install --save typescript@latest && npm install --save-dev jest@latest tslint@latest semantic-release@latest commitizen@latest cz-conventional-changelog@latest prettier@latest tslint-config-prettier@latest rimraf@latest codecov@latest
scripts.update:cli: npm install -g jest@latest semantic-release-cli@latest commitizen@latest cz-conventional-changelog@latest
scripts.build: npm run rimraf:build && npm run tsc -- -p tsconfig.pack.json && jest --config=jestconfig.pack.json
scripts.package: npm run rimraf:package && rm -f my*.tgz && npm pack
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
